CustomField.formula: if( ISBLANK(longitude__c) || ISBLANK(longitude__c) , image( "/resource/" & $Label.SB_Text_UnregisteredIcon , $Label.SB_MSG_Unregistered ) , HYPERLINK("http://maps.google.co.jp/maps?q=" & text( latitude__c ) & "," & text(longitude__c) & "&iwloc=A", $Label.SB_MSG_CheckAMap , "_blank") )
CustomField.label: 登録場所
